channel.title: Brute force password checker!
channel.description:
Okay so basically what my tool does is that you MUST download the servers client , and once its open and running log ingame look for a mod or admin and get its user .
then after that log out the account and open up my brute force ip logger and run it with the client from the servers , so that it auto matically uses the connection from the client to the brute force logger, than you just type the mod or admins password, and pick a password list (max of 10k passwords - *10mins to check through all* and then if the admins or mods password fits in with any passwords in the password list the brute force tool will show you the password.
i was over at my friends house and he has it and uses it for deltascape, 2 specced, and nrpk ive watched him hack countless accounts, but hes being a fucking nerd and says he doesnt want to give me, so anyone have any ideas on how to start this mess?????
LIVE DISCUSSION

item.title: Brute force password checker!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

We don’t accept this type of stuff here, take it somewhere else.

Read full topic

item.title: Brute force password checker!
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:4, topic:316130”][quote author=lesterknome link=topic=412706.msg3041232#msg3041232 date=1259121330]
phail, takes like 1-3 months, no joke. (Then again most people’s passwords are something stupid like ‘treepenis’)

Trying to brute force a password on a server is going to take much, much longer than 10 minutes. For a decent password it will take hours or days and for a good password it will never work. Also, any server that has any decent programming will ban all connections from your IP after a certain number of login attempts like this.

In short, it won’t work.

ur connection ----> localhost ----> proxy ----> a list of proxy’s that change every connection ----> server
[/quote]

Hehe, good luck finding a list of working SOCKS5 proxies. Been there, done that. You can manually search for them, and after checking a list of about 20, you can find 1 that works and then it will stop working shortly.[/quote]

SOCKS’5’? i just used a socks proxy list, and im like 80% sure java has it’s own class.

                InetSocketAddress dest = new InetSocketAddress(server, port);//final destenation...lol
                SocketAddress addr = new InetSocketAddress("localhost", 9050);//location of proxy server...all connections sent here to be sent else where
                Proxy proxy = new Proxy(Proxy.Type.SOCKS, addr);//proxy server type
                Socket socket = new Socket(proxy);//connect to proxy destenation
                socket.connect(dest);//use proxy to connect to destenation

Read full topic

item.title: Brute force password checker!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:3, topic:316130”]phail, takes like 1-3 months, no joke. (Then again most people’s passwords are something stupid like ‘treepenis’)

Trying to brute force a password on a server is going to take much, much longer than 10 minutes. For a decent password it will take hours or days and for a good password it will never work. Also, any server that has any decent programming will ban all connections from your IP after a certain number of login attempts like this.

In short, it won’t work.

ur connection ----> localhost ----> proxy ----> a list of proxy’s that change every connection ----> server[/quote]

Hehe, good luck finding a list of working SOCKS5 proxies. Been there, done that. You can manually search for them, and after checking a list of about 20, you can find 1 that works and then it will stop working shortly.

Read full topic
